column1: Little Goat Diner////A charming diner with fantastic food. I got the pork belly pancakes
column2: which came with some sort of bok choy slaw salad
column3: all of which was on top of a scallion pancake (which
column4: for those of you who've had them before
column5: is decently authentic--could've used a little more scallion
column6: but not bad in general). The pork belly was extremely tender and perfectly seasoned
column7: and overall I loved the Asian twist on an American brunch.
